messages.title: Under the Tories, the NHS and Social Care are in Crisis
messages.content: NHS calls in British Red Cross as A&Es forced to shut their doors 42 times in one week. (The Mirror, 6/01/2017). NHS hospital waiting lists to rise above five million in two years, leak suggests. (The Independent 4/05/2017). England faces NHS staffing crisis with a shortfall of 42,000 nurses by 2020. (The Mirror, 30/04/2017). Social care services are ‘cracking under weight’ of NHS funding crisis says head of BMA. (The Telegraph 30/12/2016).

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Highlighting the crisis in NHS and social care under the current government, emphasizing the need for better funding and resources.
